name: Dissipate Unreal Construct
aspect: Covert (though subject to Disbelief if the object in question disintegrates in front of Sleepers)
effect: By casting this spell, a mage can dissolve a Prime Arcanum phantasm, or other object crafted out of "unreal" matter (such as one sculpted out of ephemera and then drawn through the Gauntlet or one perhaps made by unusual Numina or the magics of other supernatural creatures). Successes accrued during the casting of this spell inflict levels of bashing damage on an "unreal" construct (as defi ned above) on a one-for-one basis, circumventing Durability. If the object's Structure is exceeded, the object disintegrates instantly.

rotes.roteDescription: This rote enables a Libertine to dissipate phantasms and other such constructs, without resorting to more vulgar magics.
